post.author: Fitzsimmons
post.body:
bb_matt wrote:
BNA! wrote:
- this includes private messages.


Hmmm. So they are not really private then ? ;


No, they're not. Somewhat along the lines of email, they're stored in plaintext for their entire life. In terms of PMs on phpbb, they're stored in plaintext in the database. This means that for the most part, they're private between you and the recipient, since those are the only two people that the php serves the text up to. However, anyone with full database access rights (like BNA) can use a more raw method of database viewing to see all private messages that are still stored in the DB (anything that's not been deleted by both parties).
